name: Space Spooper HD
description:
WOW! The coolest vertical scoller shooter is back!

Space Spooper REMASTER HD COLLECTION PLUS DX is now in development and you can play the game in early access for free! 

Try to defeat the evil zombie dinosaurs invading our precious platet!

Don't forget to leave your high score in the comments or post it on your insta-stories to show the world your achievement!
